title: rp card bug? :O
body:
You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time. Please wait and try again later.

Been happening to me for past hour, anyone know what this is ?

replies.body: Lol Riot probably thinks you got a free Rp code generator
You can only redeem a certain amount of codes at a time. Try again in a day or so.
don't think i dont know that u used to be black reaper

> [{quoted}](name=Jamesornator,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hie0cX7f,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-10T03:19:51.196+0000)
>
> don't think i dont know that u used to be black reaper

If you insist.
